overview: The word 'Perfection' was created for the flawless Goddess Silvia Saint. Her radiant grace and beauty is unmatched, so let's see her lick some snatch! Her luscious toned legs and petite feet are ravished by 3 of her foxy buddies who share her passion for tiny toes, horny heels and pins that go on forever.
tagline: Watch Silvia & her girlfriends make love, kiss, fondle eatch other, and please one another like only another woman can...
title: Silvia Saint's Leg Sex Friends
